DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate hemoglobin response ( efficacy ) , safety , tolerability orally administer AKB-6548 patient Chronic Kidney Disease ( pre-dialysis ) anemia dose 20 week .
DOC.brief_title: 20-Week Repeat Oral Dose Study AKB-6548 Subjects With Chronic Kidney Disease Anemia
DOC.criteria: Key 18 82 year age , inclusive Chronic Kidney Disease GFR category G3aG5 yet dialysis eGFR ≥ 10 ≤ 65 mL/minute/1.73 m2 Anemia secondary CKD ESA status Screening HGB per protocol Iron replete ferritin TSAT level define per protocol Key BMI > 44.0 kg/m2 Red blood cell transfusion within 11 week prior Screening visit Androgen therapy within previous 21 day prior Screening visit Intravenous iron within past 4 week prior Screening visit AST ALT > 1.8x ULN , alkaline phosphatase > 2x ULN , total bilirubin > 1.5x ULN Screening ECG QTc > 500 msec Uncontrolled hypertension Class III IV congestive heart failure Myocardial infarction , acute coronary syndrome , stroke within 6 month prior Screening visit
